name: Smart Boy's Gameroom
description: Smart Boy's Gameroom is a game that features a collection of casual minigames primarily aimed at very young males. It features 12 different activities to do. Activities include things such as matching the sequential order of sounds to the vehicles who made them, playing a piano (which can be tuned to also play organ and even dog noises), a card matching memorization game, a simple jigsaw puzzle, a train set to play with, and car driving mode which lets the player drive either a police car, taxi, or school bus.
